Articles.Content:
I wonder whats wrong with my install.

often when i land to a planet or moon. i touch down and sit there for a moment. i try EVA and immiadetly game crashes and im back in the windows.

This also sometimes happens when i exit WAB.

this doesnt happen when im flying in planet or space.

also my interstellar mod temperature helper doesnt work in WAB. Dunno if thats related.

all my mods run the newest versions..

sry bad english

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)

in module mono.dll at 0023:1011926a.

Error occurred at 2015-01-06_153146.

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by Jarkko.

66% memory in use.

0 MB physical memory [2704 MB free].

0 MB paging file [2918 MB free].

0 MB user address space [71 MB free].

Write to location 00200000 caused an access violation.

thats from the error log.

can anyone make sense of it?

Edited January 6, 2015 by Jarkko279
That is almost exactly the same error that I was getting when I was crashing, you'll need to get the Active Texture Management plugin to save RAM.
Ok. Thx. 64 runs stable but adds bunch of other problems. Ill give this a try.
Uh, you're running the 64 bit version of KSP? It's been declared unstable by Squad themselves, use the 32 bit version.
No. i meant 64 bit wont crash randomly. but when i play 64 bit KSC is 100% upgraded and some of my mods wont work at all.
